summary: Dark and slightly iridescent re-texture of dragonscale armor for both male & female complete with semi oxidized \'dragonbronze\' ligatures and fittings.  This is NOT just a darkened version of the original but has been repainted to subtly shift hues in the varied and dramatic lighting of Skyrim while still remaining very dark.
descriptionHtml:
Dark and slightly iridescent dragonscale armor (and shield) for both male & female complete with semi oxidized \'dragonbronze\' ligatures and fittings.  This is NOT just a darkened version of the original but has been repainted to subtly shift hues within the varied and dramatic lighting of Skyrim while still remaining very dark.  Perfect for a more shadowy warrior and looks especially dramatic when stained with enemy blood.

[COLOR=#e36c09]This re-texture was designed to complement one of my other mods, a stand alone forgeable dragonscale armor set. Link below:
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24814]Ritual Armor of Boethiah[/URL][/COLOR]
author: Wasbunny
